评论概述: If you're on the fence about this suit, buy it
评论详情: I bought this instead of renting a suit for my son for my wedding. The quality of this suit was amazing. It was super wrinkle resistant, the buttons are sturdy but it also has some spare buttons just in case.

My son requested a new church outfit for Christmas this year, so I went big and got him this black 3-piece suit. It came packaged well but a little wrinkled. To be expected. I let it hang for a couple weeks and didn't iron it although some small wrinkles can still be faintly seen. The fabric is outstanding. Sizing was a little inconsistent between the pants and vest. The pants were huge at the waist while the vest is pretty snug (my little guy is super skinny). No complaints considering the quality and price. I will likely be buying him another in a different color. I would definitely recommend this suit!

评论概述: Worked for a very slender boy - size 18 20
评论详情: I purchased a size 18 and 20 for my very slender son to try.  He is 5' 8" with long arms, wide shoulders and a very small waist (27") and shorter inseam (30").  The pants on both would probably need to be hemmed for a perfect fit, but nothing major.  The jackets both fit well, with the 20 being a slightly better fit because of the longer arm length; the difference, though, was only a 1/2-3/4".  The waist on both were acceptable because they have adjustable waists (for reference, his perfect fit khakis are from Children's Place, size 18 slim).  We kept the 20 for the jacket, although the 18 pants were the better fit. Clearly, for the price, the quality isn't going to be like a department store suit, but looks fine for the few times he will be wearing it.

I buy Yuan Lu suits for my boys usually but this year I wanted green and this seemed to be the option. I checked the sizing charts carefully and ordered up Since my boys are on the cusp of their sizes. This is a slim cut suit, which is great because my boys are long and slim (my eldest so much so that he has to wear suspenders with most outfits). The next size fit perfectly, and the pants have a VERY well done adjustable waist, permitting me to go down almost a full size in the waist, and meaning no suspenders were required! With the adjustable waist, I’ve no doubt that unless he grows 3” this year, we will get the entire year of wear out of the suit. Love the three pieces, it’s made more versatile.  The only weird thing was a sewn in plastic sleeve with an owners name paper that I guess you’re supposed to write a name on but why?!? I cut it out.  There was one irritating nit: they ran out of fabric or messed something up and the size 7 has white thread under the arms which is… off-putting, to say the least.  I still give it a 4.5/5 because of the overall quality, fit and design.

评论概述: If you need a great quality suit…this is the one
评论详情: My son loved this suit! He’s worn it to a wedding, graduation, on a cruise and formal day at school. He’s worn other suits from Menswear house to weddings and other events and prefers this one above all others. It is super versatile as it comes with a pocket square, tie and vest along with the jacket, pants and shirt. The quality is fantastic and it fits very well. I think the only reason for the ‘frequently returned item’ is people may order multiple sizes and return the others. We have more events coming up and are ordering this suit again in my son’s updated size. Additional versatility if you pair this suit with a blue or cream shirt, switch out the pocket square (or not use one), wear with or without the vest…this is definitely our go to suit. My only two regrets are not finding this suit sooner to make use of all the sizes as my son grew and that this may be our last year before my son outgrows the last size available.

Measure your child and buy the size closest to it for premium fit! Don’t size up or it will look loose and sloppy. Buy the size that fits them now. It’s priced perfectly enough you can afford to buy the size they’re currently wearing for absolute best fit. We will be buying this suit again and again as he grows. It comes with a slim black tie but we upgraded to a real tie for him and not a clip on.

评论概述: Bought for tall and skinny 14 y.o. (5ft 7in)
评论详情: Bought the Marvelous World Slim Fit Suit for my 14 y.o. to attend a funeral. He’s tall (5ft 7in) and skinny so I bought a size 20. Suit pants are long enough. Recommend buying this for growing kids that may only wear it once or twice. Fabric is decent for the price.

My grandsons looked magnificent in the suits! All but one of the 4 I purchased came with everything it should. There were pants, jacket, tie, shirt and vests. They are all made of very comfortable materials and fit like a charm. They are machine washable and easy to care for too.

My son was part of the "ring security" for a wedding so I was in search of a good quality suit and they did not disappoint. I ordered a size 3T, which I ended up getting the pants tailored because I didn't want my kid looking sloppy. Best decision I made! The quality of this suit is unmatched; he looked like a little man.  My only issue was I never received the "complimentary tie' that was supposed to be included and had to buy a tie separately. I would have given them 5 stars if it wasn't for that.

This absolutely saved me! My 17 year old son needed a navy suit for a wedding last minute and I couldn’t find any in his size that would arrive in time. He normally wears a men’s slim fit 36R jacket and 30x32 slim fit pants. He’s very skinny so slim fit typically fits him just right (not tight). So out of desperation I started looking at “boys” suits and came across this brand. I got him the size 20 boys and it fits great. While the quality isn’t as high as a department store, it really isn’t bad at all- the material looks like a normal suit and no one would know he’s not wearing a name brand suit. He is about 5’ 8” or 9” and has a short torso, longer legs. I went off the measurements they had listed and it worked well.
